Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Removes dealers of ammunition from certain provisions regarding the use of certain merchant category-codes by payment card networks
Summary: Removes dealers of ammunition from certain provisions that require the use of certain merchant category-codes by payment card networks for firearm merchants.
LawCode: Amd ยง529-a, Gen Bus L (as proposed in S.8479-A & A.9862-A)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to removing dealers of ammunition from certain provisions regarding the use of certain merchant category-codes by payment card networks
